column3: Describe the pose of the person/persons depicted.  Which gender would you assign to them?
column4: Describe the pose of the person/persons depicted. Which gender would you assign to them? Based on the image, I would assign the person depicted to a male. The two naked boys are standing in a circle, with one boy holding a sword and the other boy holding a shield. This suggests that they are engaged in a battle or a duel,
